If the modulation \\( h(t) \\) is applied to x(t) to create a new signal \\( x'(t) = x(t)e^{at} \\) at t = 0, and then \\( x'(t) \\) is transformed using Fourier, will \\( z'(\\omega) \\) be equivalent to \\( z(\\omega) \\)?
